description: A VS Code extension to format entire directories with right-click options.
config.title: Format Directory
config.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude from formatting
config.concurrencyLimit.description: Maximum number of files to format concurrently (1-50, default: 10)
config.maxFileSize.description: Maximum file size in bytes to format (0 = no limit, default: 1MB)
config.logLevel.description: Log level for the extension output
config.openOutputAfterFormat.description: Open output panel after formatting completes
config.language.description: Override the language used by the extension (auto to use VS Code language)
